name: The Lich King
description:
All over the kingdom the Lich King is feared

His power and evil is total

Many have tried to destroy him

Many have failed

Will you?

Z (or C or N) to attack, X (or V or M) to jump, arrow keys to move

Update: I've uploaded the full & final version of the game (which no longer spawns the player on top of enemies from the get-go). Made for CGA-jam June 2017.
